and name LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT p.url,p.model,p.method FROM yx_permission p LEFT JOIN yx_role_permission rp ON rp.permission_id = p.id LEFT JOIN yx_role r ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN yx_role_user ru ON ru.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ru.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_delete = 0 AND r.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY p.url
select id,name FROM yx_permission WHERE parent_id = 1 ORDER BY id
